      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main program
        Parameters:
        args - First string given as a command line argument is used as the username.

      • startUp

        public void startUp(java.lang.String name)
        Attempts to connect to the server at csil.cs.ucsb.edu on port 4242 for messaging. Then calls methods to setup the Midi and GUI regardless of whether a connection was possible.
        Parameters:
        name - The username of the user.

      • buildGUI

        public void buildGUI()
        Creates the GUI for the beatbox player.

        Attempts to setup the Midi.

      • buildTrackAndStart

        public void buildTrackAndStart()
        Checks the status of the various checkboxes and using this creates a track which it plays.

      • changeSequence

        public void changeSequence(boolean[] checkboxState)
        Sets the checkboxes in the display according to the inputted boolean array.
        Parameters:
        checkBoxState - The boolean array to use to change the values of the displayed checkboxes.

      • makeTracks

        public void makeTracks(java.util.ArrayList list)
        Makes a track from an ArrayList of Integer values.
        Parameters:
        list - The ArrayList of Integers from which to make the track.
